mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Virginia Epperly (nee Akers), Ward turned 21 years of age on 06.01.1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Virginia Epperly (nee Akers), Ward turned 21 years of age on 06.01.1893 C. M. Stigleman, Guardian until 06.01.1893 Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 206, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
